list.title: Elevana
list.description: Elevana is a beautifully designed manifestation assistant that helps you set clear intentions, stay aligned with your goals, and bring your desires into your daily life. Create meaningful manifests with clear intentions and optional notes, keep your goals visible with lock screen widgets, and stay motivated with daily reminders that strengthen your awareness and alignment. Features include lock screen widgets, daily motivation, premium options for multiple widgets and progress tracking, all wrapped in a minimal and peaceful UI designed for clarity and focus.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I am a Senior Mobile Developer specializing in fintech, mobile architectures, and high-performance cross-platform applications. With more than five years of hands-on experience in Flutter and native integrations, I have contributed to the development of secure, scalable, and user-centric digital products—particularly in payment systems, POS devices, and financial technologies.

For the past 2.5 years, I have been part of a leading fintech engineering team, and for the last year, I have served as a Senior Mobile Developer, leading critical initiatives and driving technical excellence across the mobile ecosystem. My work includes implementing payment integrations, enhancing application performance, improving overall user experience, and contributing to core architecture decisions that support long-term scalability.

Beyond my professional background in mobile development, I am deeply passionate about AI-powered automation, SaaS product creation, and emerging crypto technologies. I enjoy transforming complex ideas into practical, market-ready solutions—whether through automated workflows, modern software platforms, or innovative financial tools.

I strongly believe in continuous learning and staying ahead of technological trends. Outside of work, I develop new side projects, experiment with AI tools, and follow global advancements in Web3, fintech, and mobile ecosystems. I also enjoy mentoring junior developers, fostering collaboration, and helping teams grow through knowledge sharing and leadership.
